album_full_title: Autumn Variations (Fan Living Room Sessions) by Ed Sheeran
lyrics:
17 ContributorsTranslationsItalianoEd Sheeran - England (Türkçe Çeviri)DeutschPortuguêsEngland Lyrics[Verse 1]
It is opening day and a brand new start
The stones have been cleared around the fisherman's hut
And the air bites, then leaves almost invisible cuts on the skin
A lighthouse retired, but a new one was hired
About twenty foot taller, painted in black and white
Twenty million steps with a computer inside instead of him

[Chorus]
Only one road sign tellin' cars to slow down
And a long drop in the ocean
Beware of the riptide, broken glass and train lines
It's a new day and this is England

[Verse 2]
Next to the pub with the flag that's workin' flexible hours
'Cause there's a mismatch of carriages, soil in a boat for some flowers
Fairy lights on a building that's supplyin' us power from the sea
Electricity lines flow like veins to the town
In between, there is nothin' but grass and pebbles on the ground
Do not enter the wild here if you want to be found for the free

[Chorus]
View the flame of sunrise cut in half by the sky
And the empty of the desert
Team of birds that swerve by and then land on the wires
It's a new day and this is England
See Ed Sheeran LiveGet tickets as low as $74You might also like[Bridge]
When it's time to escape from the heavy of this
There is nothin' like washin' away
I find this country of mine gets a bad reputation
Of bein' cold and grey
But on the coast of the south to the east followed 'round
I find serenity I've never felt
There's a peace and a quiet in this island of ours
That can't be mirrored by anywhere else

[Verse 3]
Homes protruding from stones with their wood coloured black
Scattered cars in the line, steam risin' out the shack
One door at the front and then just glass out the back for the view

[Chorus]
And the blue is so bright, you'll need shades for your eyes
And a cable to pull over
Take a walk and feel like everything will be fine
It's a new day and this is England1Embed

song_full_title: England (Live from Maynard’s Living Room) by Ed Sheeran
lyrics:
3 ContributorsEngland (Live from Maynard’s Living Room) Lyrics[Verse 1]
It is opening day and a brand new start
The stones have been cleared around the fisherman's hut
And the air bites, then leaves almost invisible cuts on the skin
A lighthouse retired, but a new one was hired
About twenty foot taller, painted in black and white
Twenty million steps with a computer inside instead of him

[Chorus]
Only one road sign telling cars to slow down
And a long drop in the ocean
Beware of the riptide, broken glass and train lines
It's a new day, and this is England

[Verse 2]
Next to the pub with the flag that's workin' flexible hours
There's a mismatch of carriages, soil in a boat for some flowers
Fairy lights on a building that's supplyin' us power from the sea
Electricity lines flow like veins through the town
In between, there is nothing but grass and pebbles on the ground
Do not enter the wild here if you want to be found for the free

[Chorus]
View the flame of sunrise cut in half by the sky
And the empty of the desert
Team of birds that swerve by and then land on the wires
It's a new day, and this is England
See Ed Sheeran LiveGet tickets as low as $74You might also like[Bridge]
When it's time to escape all the heavy of this
There is nothing like washin' away
I find this country of mine gets a bad reputation
Of bein' cold and grey
From the coast of the south, the east followed 'round
I find serenity I've never felt
There's a peace and a quiet in this island of ours
That can't be mirrored by anywhere else

[Verse 3]
Homes protruding from stones with their wood coloured black
Scattered cars in a line, steam rising out the shack
One door at the front and then just glass out the back for the view

[Chorus]
And the blue is so bright, you'll need shades for your eyes
And a cable to pull over
Take a walk and feel like everything will be fine
It's a new day, and this is EnglandEmbed

album_full_title: Apple Music Live: Ed Sheeran by Ed Sheeran
song_full_title: Salt Water (Apple Music Live) by Ed Sheeran
lyrics:
2 ContributorsSalt Water (Apple Music Live) Lyrics[Intro]
Thank you very much, how you guys doing?
Welcome to Subtract
So um, the origins of this album
I know I've written about it on, online but like
When I finished Plus, my debut album, the next album I was gonna make was Subtract
And I went in, uh, with Rick Rubin
And we started recording this acoustic album
And it just sort of morphed into Multiply
Because I don't think I was probably ready to make an acoustic album
I wanted to, you know, make, sing with Pharrell and "Thinking Out Loud" and "Photograph" and do, and do all this sort of stuff and then
After that came Divide and
After Divide I really wanted to make Subtract
But it also morphed into Equals in the pandemic
And I wanted to come out of the pandemic with "Bad Habits" and havе a song that's made people dancе and stuff
So I'd been putting this record together over a decade with all my favorite acoustic songs that I'd written over the last decade
And it was uh, slated to be put out this year
Uh, and then at the beginning of last year I had, I probably had the darkest month of my life
And it made me address lots of things and
I'd met Aaron previously
Everyone make some noise for mister Aaron Dessner, right over there
And I'd met Aaron through Taylor
Taylor had hooked me and Aaron up through email
And then me and Aaron went to dinner
This is like November 2021
Me and Aaron went for dinner and uh
I was telling him I'm just about to put out this album Subtract
But after that I would love to try something different maybe with electric guitars, blah, blah, blah
And he sent me a bunch of instrumentals
And I sort of had them for awhile
And I was like, I will, I'll get to them eventually but you know
I'm gonna put out Subtract and do all of that
And then February happened
And I basically wrote over all these instrumentals
We got in the studio and we, and we finished it
And uh, what has come out of it is actually what Subtract was always meant to be which is, which is this record
Uh, so I'm gonna play it in full, all the songs and explain stories behind them
This song is called "Salt Water"
It's basically like, I've had, you know, ups and downs throughout my life since I was very very young
And uh, you know, as I've got older and become a parent
Those ups and downs, you feel more ashamed about because, you know you
You hate thinking dark dark thoughts when you have children to look after
But this is uh, a song which basically encapsulates all of that "what if"
And it's called "Salt Water"

album_full_title: Apple Music Live: Ed Sheeran by Ed Sheeran
song_full_title: Vega (Apple Music Live) by Ed Sheeran
lyrics:
2 ContributorsVega (Apple Music Live) Lyrics[Intro]
So it was pouring with rain when Aaron sent me all these, um, songs
And the first lines of this song is "Rain keeps beating on the rooftop, muddying the glass / But, God, I love the sound of heaven"
And um, yeah, this is a song, another song that was written in that batch, along with "Borderline"
And along with the next two, well, the next one, at least
And uh, it's called "Vega"
The Vega is, um, the brightest star in the Lyra constellation
Which, uh, that I find quite cool
I kind of like, it's, I found it really weird writing to Aaron's music 'cause
What, what happens with, Aaron basically sends a fully formed song, еssentially, and you write over it
And usually I would bе in the studio and I would get, I would pick up a guitar and I'd go, "Right, what do we write about tonight? We do 'bad habits lead to late nights' okay, is that a good line, is it 'bad habits lead to late nights' is this-"
And you kind of go back and forth and you bounce ideas, and that's the collaborative process that I've usually done
Whereas this collaborative process is Aaron going like, "Just write what you feel"
And I found words pouring out and some of them I was like, "What does that even mean? 'It burns like hell to be Vega'"
Like what, but it was just a line that just came out of my mouth whilst writing this song
And, ya know, this song probably took as much time to write as the song itself, like it just fell out
Uh, and I can't describe it
Aaron's, Aaron's music has songs in it that you just have to
You know, you know like in Harry Potter when it's the pensive and say the bit out
I find that like, Aaron's song is Dumbledore's mind, basically
And you just, take out, but yeah
So, this is "Vega"

So my dad, uh, said to me when I got married
He said, um
"You will not know what real love and marriage is
Until there's death and there's, uh, real sickness"
And he said this because, uh, that happens when he first married my mum
There was a real, real grief that happened in the family

That they both had to go through
And he said that that really brought them together

And you can't, you can't ever break it
And um, ya know, I've been married now almost five years

lyrics:
1 ContributorPerfect (Apple Music Live) Lyrics[Intro]
Gotta be honest, I'm super nervous about tonight
Um, I never played, uh, a whole album in full with the band the way it sounds, exactly like it sounds on the record
I'm usually, this is my live set, I'm on a loop pedal and it always sounds quite different to the record
And that's kind of the way that I like it
I like, you listening to the album and coming to a gig and then just hearing it re-imagined
But because you've never heard this album I'm about to play, we can kind of give it to you exactly the way that it is on the rеcord
And you can, I'ma tell you stories from it and blah-blah-blah
But it's a, yeah, it's gonna bе, it's gonna be weird
'Cause these stories are all real stories that happened in my life
And, uh, I often find when you release music, the music then belongs to the public
So the next song I'm gonna play, it's been out for a while
I wrote it about my wife, but it now belongs to all of you
And you guys hear this song, you don't think, "Ah, Ed's wife"
You think about the person, uh, that, that you love
But the thing is with the songs I'm about to play you is
They don't belong to you yet, they're gonna start belonging to you tonight
And, uh, well, I mean, one of them, "Eyes Closed" has been out for a couple of days
And it's been nice, sort of, hearing the stories of that
But anyway, this is a song that I wrote back in 2015 that used to belong to me
And now belongs to all of you
